Actions.Name: Deep Call
Actions.Effects: The Arkitek may summon a height 1 dungeon ruin object adjacent to its target, and the target must save or become branded.

Actions.Name: Reconfigure
Actions.Description: The Arkitek teleports any number of objects created by it or another character in range 2 to any other free space in range 2. Characters standing on or trapped inside an object are moved with them.

Actions.Name: Pillar of Iz
Actions.Description: The Arkitek summons a Pillar of Iz in range 5, pushing up characters if it's summoned under them.

Summons.Name: Pillar of Iz
Summons.SummonEffects: Aura 1. Inside the aura, relict characters have resistance.

Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Arkitek entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus, summoning it in their space.

Summons.Name: Sarcophagus of Iz
Summons.SummonEffects: Shares space with a character. While inside, they take 3 piercing damage at the start of their turns and are immobile, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus has resistance against the character inside it.
